p: Another source of polyphenols (anthocyanins and hydrolysed tannins) with beneficial effects on the condition of the skin is pomegranates ( Punica granatum) [ 208]. Research has confirmed the photochemoprotective, antioxidant, anti-inflammatory and antiproliferative properties of pomegranate extract. Pomegranate fruit extract has been shown to reduce UVB-induced oxidative stress and the oxidation of skin proteins [ 209], and also to improve the color of the skin and restore the glow of skin exposed to UV radiation [ 210].
